main.name: Vishesh Prajapati
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe React
main.bio: I am a dedicated and results-driven Full Stack Web Developer with a strong foundation in both frontend and backend technologies. With hands-on experience across diverse projects, I bring a blend of creativity, problem-solving, and technical excellence. Passionate about building scalable, user-centric applications that deliver real business value.

education.description: Graduated with First Class Honours - 8.30 CGPA.

work.title: Product Engineer
work.description: At TCS, I worked as a Product Engineer developing a Loan Onboarding Application for ING Bank (Australia). I built UDCs, reusable components, handled UI design, and integrated APIs using React.js, JavaScript, and Angularâ€”sharpening my technical skills and preparing me to contribute effectively to new opportunities.

work.title: Senior Software Engineer
work.description: As a Senior Software Engineer at Accenture, I work on the Best Buy eCommerce project, handling full-stack development using JavaScript, React, Redux, and Node.js. I build scalable web applications, create APIs, optimize performance, and collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality, user-centric solutions across frontend and backend.

testimonials.text: Vishesh is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Vishesh has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
